   </nav>
   <!-- &lt;div class="main-content content-width cf sidebar-right"&gt;
        &lt;div class="main-content-area-container cf"&gt;
            &lt;div class="sidebar-bg"&gt;&lt;/div&gt; !-->

    <script async="" src="//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js">
    </script>

    </ins>
    <script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    </script>
   </center>
   <div class="main-content content-width cf sidebar-right">
    <div class="main-content-area-container cf">
     <div class="sidebar-bg">
     </div>
     <div class="main-content-area post-15362 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-c-england category-top-stories tag-adverse-reactions tag-sallie-elkordy tag-truth-about-vaccines tag-vaccine-associated-polio-paralysis-vapp" id="post-15362">
      <div class="latest-post cf">
       <h1 class="the-title">
        Two More Children Left Paralyzed by Vaccines Before Chinese CDC And WHO Admit Vaccines Cause Paralysis
       </h1>
       <div class="cf post-meta-container">
        <p class="post-meta">
         <a href="http://vactruth.com/author/christina-england/" rel="author" title="View all posts by Christina England">
          Christina England
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="post-meta date-extra">
         November 1 2013
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="post-image">
        <img alt="little-boy" class="attachment-post-thumbnail wp-post-image" height="300" src="http://vactruth.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/little-boy-500x300.jpg" width="500"/>
       </div>
       <div class="single-post-content cf">
        <div class="nc_socialPanel sw_flatFresh sw_fade" data-count="5" data-float="floatBottom" data-floatcolor="#e2e2e2" data-position="both" data-url="http://vactruth.com/2013/11/01/children-paralyzed-by-vaccines/">
         <div class="nc_tweetContainer fb" data-count="0" data-id="3" data-num="40" data-wid="65">
          <a class="nc_tweet" data-link="http://www.facebook.com/share.php?u=http://vactruth.com/2013/11/01/children-paralyzed-by-vaccines/?utm_source=SocialWarfare&amp;utm_medium=facebook&amp;utm_campaign=SocialWarfare" target="_blank">
           <div class="iconFiller">
            <div class="spaceManWilly" style="width:65px;">
             <i class="fa fa-facebook">
             </i>
             <span class="sw_share">
              Share
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
           <span class="count">
            4.2K
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="nc_tweetContainer twitter" data-count="0" data-id="2" data-num="40" data-wid="70">
          <a class="nc_tweet" data-link="https://twitter.com/share?original_referer=/&amp;text=Two+More+Children+Left+Paralyzed+by+Vaccines+Before+Chinese+CDC+And+WHO+Admit+Vaccines+Cause+Paralysis&amp;url=http://vactruth.com/2013/11/01/children-paralyzed-by-vaccines/%3Futm_source%3DSocialWarfare%26utm_medium%3Dtwitter%26utm_campaign%3DSocialWarfare&amp;via=vactruth">
           <div class="iconFiller">
            <div class="spaceManWilly" style="width:70px;">
             <i class="fa fa-twitter">
             </i>
             <span class="sw_share">
              Tweet
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
           <span class="count">
            128
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="nc_tweetContainer googlePlus" data-count="13" data-id="1" data-num="18" data-wid="45">
          <a class="nc_tweet" data-link="https://plus.google.com/share?url=http://vactruth.com/2013/11/01/children-paralyzed-by-vaccines/%3Futm_source%3DSocialWarfare%26utm_medium%3DGooglePlus%26utm_campaign%3DSocialWarfare" target="_blank">
           <div class="iconFiller">
            <div class="spaceManWilly" style="width:46px;">
             <i class="fa fa-google">
             </i>
             <span class="sw_share">
              +1
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
           <span class="count">
            13
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="nc_tweetContainer nc_pinterest" data-id="4" data-num="25" data-wid="55">
          <a class="nc_tweet" data-count="0" data-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fvactruth.com%2F2013%2F11%2F01%2Fchildren-paralyzed-by-vaccines%2F&amp;media=http%3A%2F%2Fvactruth.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2013%2F11%2Flittle-boy.jpg&amp;description=Two+More+Children+Left+Paralyzed+by+Vaccines+Before+Chinese+CDC+And+WHO+Admit+Vaccines+Cause+Paralysis">
           <div class="iconFiller">
            <div class="spaceManWilly" style="width:55px;">
             <i class="fa fa-pinterest">
             </i>
             <span class="sw_share">
              Pin
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
           <span class="count">
            8
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="nc_tweetContainer totes totesalt" data-id="6">
          <span class="count">
           <span class="label">
            TOTAL SHARES
           </span>
           4.3K
          </span>
         </div>
        </div>
        <p>
         In a shocking report, the
         <em>
          Global Times
         </em>
         reported that an expert from the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), Dr. Wang Yu, has openly admitted that vaccines can cause severe adverse reactions, including swollen organs, epilepsy, and in some instances, the diseases that they were supposed to prevent!
        </p>
        <p>
         His startling revelations came when newspapers revealed that two small children had become paralyzed after they had received childhood vaccinations. Dr. Wang Yu stated:
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Some recipients experience sudden swelling of the organs, which can be cured with timely treatment. Some, however, develop epilepsy. Others suffer irreversible damage to their bodies, an effect referred to as vaccine sequelae.
         </em>
         [1]
        </p>
        <p>
         In other words, vaccines can cause irreversible damage to a childs body and brain as a secondary consequence of the vaccination. Despite this amazing turn of events, it appears that this story has been passed by, largely unnoticed.
        </p>
        <p style="text-align: center;">
        </p>
        <div class="a-single a-9">
         <center>
          <script type="text/javascript">
           // &lt;![CDATA[
google_ad_client = "pub-0158531265405623";
/* 300x250, created 12/31/09 */
google_ad_slot = "4336731034";
google_ad_width = 300;
google_ad_height = 250;
// ]]&gt;
          </script>
          <script src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js" type="text/javascript">
          </script>
         </center>
        </div>
        <h3>
         The Heartbreaking Story Unfolds
        </h3>
        <p>
         On October 9, 2013, the Global Times highlighted that two children had been left paralyzed after receiving childhood vaccinations in China.
        </p>
        <p>
         Fourteen days after receiving a polio vaccination, four month-old Young Hu was left fighting for his life after he suffered heart failure and slipped into a coma. After three days of treatment, he slowly recovered, but was left paralyzed in his left leg.
        </p>
        <p>
         According to the report, staff at the hospital in Jinan, in the eastern Chinese province of Shandong, reported the baby to be suffering from polio.
        </p>
        <p>
         Young Hu was not the only child who was affected. Six year-old Zhang Liyang had suffered similar problems after she received vaccinations for polio and chicken pox.
        </p>
        <p>
         According to reporters, Zhang Liyang received the polio vaccine in December 2012. Nine days later, the six year-old had also been hospitalized.
        </p>
        <p>
         After receiving routine vaccinations, the youngster complained about a pain in her back. At first, her mother thought her daughter just did not want to go to school, but she kept complaining, so her father Zhang Gongxian took her to their local hospital. Her mother said:
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          The doctor asked me if she had received any vaccinations. I told him Yes, she had a varicella vaccination. The doctor told me that the vaccine can possibly lead to illness, but we didnt think it would become so bad.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p>
         From the report, it is unclear if Zhang received the polio vaccine and the chicken pox vaccination separately or both at the same time.
        </p>
        <p>
         The
         <em>
          Global Times
         </em>
         stated:
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Little Zhang then lost feeling below the waist.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Desperate for answers, her father took her to a major hospital, also in Jinan, where doctors diagnosed her with myelitis, or inflammation of the bone marrow in her spinal cord.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p>
         The little girl, who was reported to have loved singing and dancing, has been left incontinent and confined to a wheelchair. Although she receives therapy, doctors have told her parents that she is unlikely to recover.
        </p>
        <p>
         Dr .Wang Yu, an expert from the Chinese CDC, explained the magnitude of these adverse effects, saying:
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          If a persons immune system doesnt work properly, it is unable to stimulate antibodies. Therefore, rather than being destroyed in the body, the pathogens attack the nervous system and actually cause the disease that they are supposed to prevent.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p>
         He warned that it could take several days or months for a patient to present the symptoms of an adverse reaction, making it even more difficult to identify sequelae.
        </p>
        <p>
         In other words, although adverse reactions to vaccines do not always appear immediately, they can paralyze children and, in some cases, actually cause the disease that child was vaccinated against!
        </p>
        <h3>
         Vaccine Pushers Admit The Truth About Vaccines
        </h3>
        <p>
         It is about time that the CDC admitted the truth about vaccines, as they have probably been aware of the dangers of the polio vaccine for some time. Especially, as the developer of the polio vaccination, Dr. Jonas Salk, admitted this exact same thing during a meeting in 1977, when he was reported to have said:
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Live virus vaccines against influenza and paralytic polio, for example, may in each instance cause the disease it is intended to prevent 
         </em>
         [2]
        </p>
        <p>
         In April of this year, the World Health Organization also admitted that the polio vaccination could cause polio. They stated on their website:
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Oral polio vaccine (OPV) contains an attenuated (weakened) vaccine-virus, activating an immune response in the body. When a child is immunized with OPV, the weakened vaccine-virus replicates in the intestine for a limited period, thereby developing immunity by building up antibodies. During this time, the vaccine-virus is also excreted. In areas of inadequate sanitation, this excreted vaccine-virus can spread in the immediate community (and this can offer protection to other children through passive immunization), before eventually dying out.
         </em>
         <br/>
         <em>
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          On rare occasions, if a population is seriously under-immunized, an excreted vaccine-virus can continue to circulate for an extended period of time. The longer it is allowed to survive, the more genetic changes it undergoes. In very rare instances, the vaccine-virus can genetically change into a form that can paralyze  this is what is known as a circulating vaccine-derived poliovirus (cVDPV). [
         </em>
         3]
        </p>
        <p>
         Although the OPV polio vaccine drops are no longer used in the US, they are still used in abundance in developing countries.
        </p>
        <p>
         So, why have vaccinations been allowed to continue for so long and what exactly is being done about it?
        </p>
        <h3>
         Activist Sallie O. Elkordy Speaks Out
        </h3>
        <div class="wp-caption alignleft" id="attachment_15368" style="width: 310px">
         <a href="http://vactruth.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/sallyelkordy.jpg" onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/downloads/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/sallyelkordy.jpg');">
          <img alt="sallielkordy" class="size-medium wp-image-15368" height="233" src="http://vactruth.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/sallyelkordy-300x233.jpg" width="300"/>
         </a>
         <p class="wp-caption-text">
          Advocate Sallie O. Elkordy courageously speaks out against dangerous vaccines.
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         One person who is trying to end this child abuse by the state and who is not afraid to speak out is Ms. Sallie O. Elkordy.
        </p>
        <p>
         Last week at a public hearing in New York, she made a stand for the rights of children, not only in New York but throughout the United States of America, when she tried to stop the governor from mandating two more unnecessary vaccinations for the under-fives as a condition of day care. [4]
        </p>
        <p>
         At the hearing, held at the Department of Health &amp; Mental Hygiene on October 23, 2013, she gave a speech lasting just over eight minutes. She made her thoughts and opinions very clear and, quite frankly, she should be congratulated for her bravery. She said:
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          We are being given the choice, if we are being given a choice at all, of a life-stealing vaccine, but it is not being said to us this way. It is being said Would you like a life saving vaccine. So my new legislation, which is ban vaccines, has, ban vaccines 2013, this year.
         </em>
         (sic)
         <em>
          There is no reason to put it off, as the ingredients are one hundred percent toxic and the diseases which result, which are all diseases in internal medicine, are deadly and are life-shortening or diminishing your child or yourself.
         </em>
         [5]
        </p>
        <p>
         This is an extremely strong message, but one that rings true for many parents. Sallie did not stop there, though, because a few days later, she followed her speech by submitting this letter:
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Dear Robin Winholz,
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          I left you with 4 items at the hearing on October 23, 2013 at the NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene Hearing regarding Vaccine Mandates for day-care, preschool and kindergarten children. They were:
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          1) Proposed Legislation to BAN VACCINES 2013! (for three reasons: the Toxic ingredients, the Diseases that result and the Intent to cause those diseases)
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          2) The movie Silent Epidemic: The Untold Story of Vaccines by Gary Null, PhD, which I also asked you to hold a screening of at the Department. I told you I would help you promote attendance if you were to do this.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          3) A card that read, Investigate Before You Vaccinate which had links to websites which take you directly to the inserts for vaccines and list the known adverse reactions to each.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          4) The CDCs own literature indicating a low incidence of flu this year.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Please share this information with everyone on the panel that will be evaluating vaccine mandates for infants and toddlers.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          I leave you with a quote from Dr. Boyd Haley, Professor and Chair, Department of Chemistry, University of Kentucky (2001), A single vaccine given to a six-pound newborn is the equivalent of giving a 180-pound adult 30 vaccinations on the same day.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          It is important to note that Dr. Sherri Tenpenny has recently stated that 30,000 nurses have quit their jobs to avoid being vaccinated with the flu shot. These too were mandated, either by the hospitals they worked at or other authority. I guess the question is, who should possess such authority?
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Let me know if you will be screening the movie I gave you and if so, when.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          I look forward to receiving a transcript of the hearing from October 23rd. You are welcome to e-mail it to me at this e-mail address or mail it to me at the address below.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          Please also inform me when the Committee that will be evaluating our statements and information will be meeting so that I can attend.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
         <em>
          To your health!
         </em>
         <br/>
         <em>
          Sallie O. Elkordy
         </em>
        </p>
        <h3>
         Conclusion
        </h3>
        <p>
         Even though vaccines have been known to cause brain damage and have done very little to prevent disease, governments continue to add more and more vaccines to the childrens vaccination schedule. This is despite the fact that the developer of the polio vaccine has openly admitted in 1977 that live virus vaccines such as influenza and paralytic polio can cause the diseases that they are intended to prevent.
        </p>
        <p>
         As the cracks are beginning to show, it appears that the CDC and the WHO are beginning to crumble under the weight of complaining parents and professionals. This is not before its time.
        </p>
        <p>
         Armed with these facts, isnt it about time that we thought of our children and stopped vaccinating them until vaccinations have been proven to be safe and the CDC can openly admit that they are safe and effective, instead of the reverse? After all, as parents, we have a duty to protect our children and keep them safe.
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>

         <strong>

         </strong>

         <div class="nc_tweetContainer nc_pinterest" data-id="4" data-num="25" data-wid="55">
          <a class="nc_tweet" data-count="0" data-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fvactruth.com%2F2013%2F11%2F01%2Fchildren-paralyzed-by-vaccines%2F&amp;media=http%3A%2F%2Fvactruth.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2013%2F11%2Flittle-boy.jpg&amp;description=Two+More+Children+Left+Paralyzed+by+Vaccines+Before+Chinese+CDC+And+WHO+Admit+Vaccines+Cause+Paralysis">

          <div class="dsq-comment-body" id="dsq-comment-body-15008">
           <div class="dsq-comment-message" id="dsq-comment-message-15008">
            <p>
             This below expose titled Letters from Albert Sabin is a somewhat interesting read, and speaks of attenuated viruses in the vaccine capable of reversion to virulence. This is well would be compounded by its use in unsanitary environments and such as it still is in use in underdeveloped countries today. They have yet been unable to admit to media wise, and nor explain away the known 48,000 cases of acute flacid paralysis existing today in India alone. India of course has used in great quantity the oral live polio vaccine. The claim is that there are some 200 know enteroviruses existing in such an environment, and as said causation of these cases of AFP. Oddly those said enteroviruses do not seem to be prevalent in countries but those using the oral polio vaccine.
            </p>
            <p>
             Letters from Albert Sabin
             <br/>
             <a href="http://www.virology.ws/2009/01/19/letters-from-albert-sabin/" onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/outgoing/www.virology.ws/2009/01/19/letters-from-albert-sabin/');" rel="nofollow">
              http://www.virology.ws/2009/01/19/letters-from-albert-sabin/
             </a>
            </p>

              http://www.vacfacts.info/failure-of-the-continued-polio-vaccine-campaign.html
             </a>
            </p>

             Scientific proof that the known cancer causing SV40 virus, a previous contaminant in the polio vaccine, is obviously either contagious; or the virus is still in the vaccine/s.
             <br/>
             <a href="http://www.vacfacts.info/scientific-proof-that-the-known-cancer-causing-sv40-virus-a-previous-contaminant-in-the-polio-vaccine-is-obviously-either-contagious-or-the-virus-is-still-in-the-vaccines.html" onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/outgoing/www.vacfacts.info/scientific-proof-that-the-known-cancer-causing-sv40-virus-a-previous-contaminant-in-the-polio-vaccine-is-obviously-either-contagious-or-the-virus-is-still-in-the-vaccines.html');" rel="nofollow">

         <!-- #comment-## -->
         <li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="dsq-comment-15015">
          <div class="dsq-comment-header" id="dsq-comment-header-15015">
           <cite id="dsq-cite-15015">
            <span id="dsq-author-user-15015">
             ponerology
            </span>
           </cite>
          </div>
          <div class="dsq-comment-body" id="dsq-comment-body-15015">
           <div class="dsq-comment-message" id="dsq-comment-message-15015">
            <p>
             Okay, I watched the video. All well and good.
             <br/>
             So why does England hedge her bet at the very end of the piece by writing, Armed with these facts, isnt it about time that we thought of our children and stopped vaccinating them until vaccinations have been proven to be safe and the CDC can openly admit that they are safe and effective, instead of the reverse? ??
            </p>
            <p>
             I suggest that we dont hedge our bets by pretending that vaccines can ever be proven safe when they can never be safe no matter what study comes out to purport they are, because they are not meant to be safe. To pretend that anyone can ever get the truth from the very organizations whose existence is predicated on the lie that they exist to help you but instead are meant to eliminate you and take your money while they do it, is sheer stupidity. That is the sign of someone who runs to their abuser to beg them to stop the abuse and expects that it might end simply by their ability to plead their case well. There is no negotiating with evil. And the CDC and WHO arent going to crumble under the pressure from vactruth and the thousands of other (rightfully) complaining people. The people behind this agenda understand and respect power and its proper use. And they understand how to use those who are their bureaucratic minions to keep the vast majority in check.
             <br/>
             So stop hedging bets. Tell it like it is and let the chips fall where they may. We owe our allegiance to the Truth first; Then we owe the Truth to our children and families and communities. The world can never be saved'; only individual people can be saved, one person at a time.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>
         <!-- #comment-## -->
         <li class="comment even thread-even depth-1" id="dsq-comment-15018">
          <div class="dsq-comment-header" id="dsq-comment-header-15018">
           <cite id="dsq-cite-15018">
            <span id="dsq-author-user-15018">
             elnura
            </span>
           </cite>
          </div>
          <div class="dsq-comment-body" id="dsq-comment-body-15018">
           <div class="dsq-comment-message" id="dsq-comment-message-15018">
            <p>
             I applaud Sallie O. Elkordy in your face aggressive approach.  You cannot use subtlety with vaccine apologist and those that just follow the flow of the vaccine industry.  People have been so indoctrinated into believing that vaccines work which is the mantra that they repeat,  that they dont even question it because my Doctor says they are safe.  I was in a debate with a guy that was in the health care industry that was telling people not to pay attention to what I was posting because I was  anti-vax.  The article was on gardasil so I asked him to present a independent double blind placebo based controlled study on gardasil.  Of course he couldnt because there are none.  He than stated that the CDC and FDA wouldnt say it was safe and effective if it wasnt true.
            </p>
            <p>
             I reminded him that Vioxx, Avandia, Thalidomide, Swine Flu Vaccine, Bextra, Baycol, Cylert, Darvocet, Propulsid and Doctors used to promoted one brand of cigarette over another in prints ads and TV commercials (
             <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YuveAzHbYs4" onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/outgoing/www.youtube.com/watch?v=YuveAzHbYs4');" rel="nofollow">
              http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YuveAzHbYs4
             </a>
             ) all declared safe and effective by the FDA &amp; CDC.  Even DDT in the 1940s &amp; 50s was declared safe enough to bathe your children in it, wash down the walls of your home, wash bed linen &amp; curtains with it, wash down your milk cows, all declared safe by the Public Health department.  For those who arent aware of it DDT poisoning manifest the exact same symptoms as Polio and many Doctors dont believe there is a polio virus.  Many in the 1950s these Doctors believed people were experiencing DDT poisoning and did not recommend the polio vaccine. Once their systems were clear, the symptoms disappeared.  My point is, just because the government says its safe, doesnt mean its so.  The mere fact that vaccine companies in collusion with the CDC &amp; FDA will not release vaccines safety and effectiveness studies demonstrate not only a contempt for people, it also demonstrates a diss-connect from humanity. As state in the Simpsonwood Transcripts one of the many revealing statements made by Dr. Johnson, a public health official from the state of Michigan:
            </p>
            <p>
             Dr. Johnson makes an incredible statement, one that defines the problem we
             <br/>
             have in this country with the promoters of these vaccines. He states, As
             <br/>
             an aside, we found a cultural difference between
             <br/>
             vaccinologist and environmental
             <br/>
             health people in that many of us in the vaccine arena
             <br/>
             have never thought about uncertainty factors
             <br/>
             before. We tend to be relatively concrete in our thinking.Then he says,
             <br/>
             One of the big cultural events in that meeting was when Dr. Clarkson
             <br/>
             repetitively pointed out to us that we just didnt get it about uncertainty, and
             <br/>
             he was actually quite right.
            </p>
            <p>
             The makers of vaccine call themselves vaccinologist.  There is no training or degrees for this self serving title they have given themselves.  Dr. Russell Blaylock states it this way in his paper The Truth Behind the Vaccine Coverup
             <a href="http://medicalveritas.com/manBlaylock.pdf" onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/outgoing/medicalveritas.com/manBlaylock.pdf');" rel="nofollow">
              http://medicalveritas.com/manBlaylock.pdf
             </a>
            </p>
            <p>
             Its an ill-defined term used to describe
             <br/>
             people who are obsessed with vaccines, not that
             <br/>
             they actually study the effects
             <br/>
             of the vaccines, as we shall see throughout this
             <br/>
             meeting. Most important is the admission by Dr.
             <br/>
             Johnson that he and his fellow
             <br/>
             vaccinologists are so blinded by their obsession with forcing vaccines on society that they never even considered that there might be
             <br/>
             factors involved that could greatly affect human health, the so-called uncertainties. Further, he admits that he and his fellow vaccinologists like to think in concrete terms; that
             <br/>
             is, they are very narrow in their thinking and wear blinders that prevent them from seeing the numerous problems occurring with
             <br/>
             large numbers of vaccinations in
             <br/>
             infants and children. Their goal in life is to vaccinate
             <br/>
             as many people as possible with an ever-growing number
             <br/>
             of vaccines.
            </p>
            <p>
             There are so many layers to the vaccines holocaust its difficult to know where to start to stop the abuse.  Exposure on a massive level I think is called for.  Not just the rhetoric that vaccines are dangerous, but exposure of all the people who were at the Simpsonwood Meeting who were told the problems that existed and instead of taking steps to remedy the situation, chose to cover it up because financially they felt the industry couldnt survive the lawsuits that would surely occur.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>

             Erwin Alber
            </span>
           </cite>
          </div>
          <div class="dsq-comment-body" id="dsq-comment-body-15019">
           <div class="dsq-comment-message" id="dsq-comment-message-15019">
            <p>
             Thanks for the great article! This kind of information needs to get out to as many people particularly parents as possible, to at long last put an end to this medical fraud, medical child abuse and medical experiment without informed consent and without a control in direct violation of the Nuremberg Code.
            </p>
            <p>
             I only have one disagreement:
            </p>
            <p>
             Even though vaccines have been known to cause brain damage and have done
             <br/>
             very little to prevent disease
            </p>
            <p>
             Vaccines have done NOTHING to prevent disease, as vaccines dont prevent, but PROMOTE ill-health, which is the REAL reason why they are given.
             <br/>
             <a href="http://www.vaccinationinformationnetwork.com/do-vaccines-save-lives-what-infectious-disease-mortality-graphs-show/" onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/outgoing/www.vaccinationinformationnetwork.com/do-vaccines-save-lives-what-infectious-disease-mortality-graphs-show/');" rel="nofollow">
              http://www.vaccinationinformationnetwork.com/do-vaccines-save-lives-what-infectious-disease-mortality-graphs-show/
             </a>
            </p>
            <p>
             <a href="http://www.vaccinationinformationnetwork.com/jon-rappaport-interviews-former-vaccine-researcher-dr-mark-randall/" onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/outgoing/www.vaccinationinformationnetwork.com/jon-rappaport-interviews-former-vaccine-researcher-dr-mark-randall/');" rel="nofollow">
              http://www.vaccinationinformationnetwork.com/jon-rappaport-interviews-former-vaccine-researcher-dr-mark-randall/
             </a>
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>

The specialist in the hospital saw that I was better able to take of him than they &amp; sent us home with an oxygen tent asking me to teach him what I used to save my boy from choking to death in the attacks. I used shiatsu to release the respiratory spasms &amp; homeopathy to cure him. 15 other children in our neighborhood also contracted the disease from the vaccine at the same time. the clinic used a lame excuse to destroy the stock on hand thereby avoiding being sued.

         <li class="comment even thread-even depth-1" id="dsq-comment-15772">
          <div class="dsq-comment-header" id="dsq-comment-header-15772">
           <cite id="dsq-cite-15772">

             josh

           </cite>
          </div>
          <div class="dsq-comment-body" id="dsq-comment-body-15772">
           <div class="dsq-comment-message" id="dsq-comment-message-15772">
            <p>
             mass inoculation against polio was the cause of most  polio cases throughout the USA since 1961. Dr Jonas Salk
             <br/>
             The inventor saying this is far better evidence than any peer reviewed study they try to produce to say the the opposite.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>
         <!-- #comment-## -->
         <li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="dsq-comment-15773">
          <div class="dsq-comment-header" id="dsq-comment-header-15773">
           <cite id="dsq-cite-15773">
            <span id="dsq-author-user-15773">
             josh
            </span>
           </cite>
          </div>
          <div class="dsq-comment-body" id="dsq-comment-body-15773">
           <div class="dsq-comment-message" id="dsq-comment-message-15773">
            <p>
             What is your point? no one is saying that these outbreaks dont ever happen. The small portion of vaccinated kids got the measles as well, which you forgot to mention. there were no serious complications or deaths and a 0% attack rate in the age group that were old enough to have lived through the previous outbreak. Meaning they got measles their bodies immune system handled it, much like it would chicken pox, and they were immune the next time it came around. This is not evidence for vaccination, it is evidence that vaccination is not needed. It shows that with a healthy strong immune system, measles is not nearly as dangerous, as you would like to make everyone think
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>
         <!-- #comment-## -->
         <li class="comment even thread-even depth-1" id="dsq-comment-15780">

             <br/>
             2) Cancer and vaccinations?  Quoting from 1909? Really? Really?  I am not even going to bother.
             <br/>
             3) Read my comment to tfrost.  It applies to you too, perhaps even more so.
             <br/>
             4) I will not be wasting any more time on you either.   You can continue with your superficial understanding of this topic (I use term understanding loosely).  It is a futile exercise to try and educate any of you on this issue.  It is fortunate that public health policy is not made by the likes of you.
            </p>

             <br/>
             2) you try, and disregard, all people that say vaccines are dangerous as crazy conspiracy theorist, that reads something online and knows more than the medical establishment. So I showed a comment showing that this is clearly wrong.
             <br/>
             3) see 2
             <br/>

Trying to educate me that something with high toxic substances in it will prevent and not cause ailments, is futile, you are right about that. I have to much common sense and am capable of using logic and critical thinking, so I will never be tricked into thinking something so asinine.

             Sorry but I cannot help but reply just one more time.  I do find your comments amusing so thank you!
             <br/>
             Do not deceive yourself into thinking that someone cannot detect your true intellectual stature.  Your thought formulations are quite telling, not to mention their content.
             <br/>
             Jonas Salk invented an inactivated (killed) vaccine.  Take a guess as to what that might mean regarding the accuracy of your statement? Please read more carefully!
             <br/>
             On your next trip to the hospital, which I hope you never have, do tell the doctors to prescribe vitamins and minerals instead of that other stuff.  I am sure your body will heal much faster!
             <br/>
             Do you remember that time when common sense told us the earth was round, that it was not the centre of the universe, and that living organisms evolve?  Or what about that time common sense built the computer or cell phone you are using, or discovered the Higgs-Boson, or general relativity?  Me neither!
             <br/>
             I promise now that I will not reply as my ad hominems are clearly substandard.  My apologies!
            </p>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       var disqus_url = 'http://vactruth.com/2013/11/01/children-paralyzed-by-vaccines/';
var disqus_identifier = '15362 http://vactruth.com/?p=15362';
var disqus_container_id = 'disqus_thread';
var disqus_shortname = 'vactruth';
var disqus_title = "Two More Children Left Paralyzed by Vaccines Before Chinese CDC And WHO Admit Vaccines Cause Paralysis";
var disqus_config_custom = window.disqus_config;
var disqus_config = function () {
    /*
    All currently supported events:
    onReady: fires when everything is ready,
    onNewComment: fires when a new comment is posted,
    onIdentify: fires when user is authenticated
    */
    
    
    this.language = '';
        this.callbacks.onReady.push(function () {

        // sync comments in the background so we don't block the page
        var script = document.createElement('script');
        script.async = true;
        script.src = '?cf_action=sync_comments&amp;post_id=15362';

        var firstScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        firstScript.parentNode.insertBefore(script, firstScript);
    });
    
    if (disqus_config_custom) {
        disqus_config_custom.call(this);
    }
};

(function() {
    var dsq = document.createElement('script'); dsq.type = 'text/javascript';
    dsq.async = true;
    dsq.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
    (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(dsq);
})();
      </script>

       <div class="tve-leads-widget tve-leads-track-widget-9 tve-tl-anim tl-anim-instant">
        <div class="tl-style" data-state="9" id="tve_two_set">
         <style class="tve_custom_style" type="text/css">
          [data-tve-custom-colour="35257053"] { border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; }
         </style>
         <div class="tve-leads-conversion-object" data-tl-type="widget">
          <div class="tve_flt">
           <div class="tve_shortcode_editor" id="tve_editor">
            <div class="thrv-leads-widget thrv_wrapper tve_editor_main_content tve_two_set_v2 tve_green tve_brdr_solid" data-tve-custom-colour="35257053">
             <div class="thrv_wrapper thrv_contentbox_shortcode" data-tve-style="1">
              <div class="tve_cb tve_cb1 tve_blue" style="border-radius: 0px;">
               <div class="tve_hd tve_cb_cnt" style="border-radius: 0px;">
                <h3 class="tve_p_center bold_text" style="font-size: 25px;">
                 <span class="bold_text">
                  <span class="tve_custom_font_size" style="font-size: 26px;">
                   Your generous gift will change lives.
                  </span>
                 </span>
                </h3>
                <span>
                </span>
               </div>
               <div class="tve_cb_cnt">
                <p class="" style="color: rgb(21, 21, 21);">
                 Serious vaccine injuries happen to children every day and are often ignored by medical professionals.
                </p>
                <p class="" style="color: rgb(21, 21, 21);">
                 Each parent has their own story, journey, experience, and feelings to share with you.
                </p>
                <p class="" style="color: rgb(21, 21, 21);">
                 Facing that journey is precisely why we are developing programs to help parents heal that have a vaccine injured child.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <h4 class="" style="color: #fff; font-size: 34px;line-height: 40px;margin-top: 0;margin-bottom: 0;">
             </h4>

     <div class="col widget widget_nav_menu" id="nav_menu-3">
      <div class="menu-vt-footer-menu-container">
       <ul class="menu" id="menu-vt-footer-menu">
        <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-home menu-item-15251" id="menu-item-15251">

   // &lt;![CDATA[
        var disqus_shortname = 'vactruth';
        (function () {
            var nodes = document.getElementsByTagName('span');
            for (var i = 0, url; i &lt; nodes.length; i++) {
                if (nodes[i].className.indexOf('dsq-postid') != -1) {
                    nodes[i].parentNode.setAttribute('data-disqus-identifier', nodes[i].getAttribute('data-dsqidentifier'));
                    url = nodes[i].parentNode.href.split('#', 1);
                    if (url.length == 1) { url = url[0]; }
                    else { url = url[1]; }
                    nodes[i].parentNode.href = url + '#disqus_thread';
                }
            }
            var s = document.createElement('script'); 
            s.async = true;
            s.type = 'text/javascript';
            s.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/count.js';
            (document.getElementsByTagName('HEAD')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('BODY')[0]).appendChild(s);
        }());
        // ]]&gt;

  <script type="text/javascript">
   /*&lt;![CDATA[*/var TL_Const={"security":"483eed9d84","ajax_url":"\/\/vactruth.com\/wp-admin\/admin-ajax.php","forms":{"lightbox":{"_key":"8","trigger":"time","trigger_config":{"s":"7","exi":""},"form_type_id":16701,"main_group_id":16699,"active_test_id":""},"widget":{"_key":"9","trigger":"page_load","trigger_config":{},"form_type_id":16710,"main_group_id":16699,"active_test_id":""}},"action_conversion":"tve_leads_ajax_conversion","action_impression":"tve_leads_ajax_impression","ajax_load":0,"main_group_id":16699,"display_options":{"allowed_post_types":[]},"custom_post_data":[]}/*]]&gt; */
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var TL_Front = TL_Front || {}; TL_Front.impressions_data = TL_Front.impressions_data || {};TL_Front.impressions_data.lightbox = {"group_id":16699,"form_type_id":16701,"variation_key":"8","active_test_id":0,"output_js":true};TL_Front.impressions_data.widget = {"group_id":16699,"form_type_id":16710,"variation_key":"9","active_test_id":0,"output_js":true};
  </script>
  <script id="tve-main-js" type="text/javascript">
   var TL_Front = TL_Front || {};
    /* minor hackery to ensure we have this available */
    var ThriveGlobal = ThriveGlobal || {$j: jQuery.noConflict()};

    /**
     * Ajax call to increment impressions for all forms that might be displayed on the page
     */
    TL_Front.do_impression = function () {
        var data = TL_Front.impressions_data;
        if (data === undefined) {
            console.log("No form to register impression for !");
            return;
        }

        ThriveGlobal.$j.post(TL_Const.ajax_url, {
            security: TL_Const.security,
            action: TL_Const.action_impression,
            tl_data: data
        }).done(function () {
            //TODO: do something here if required
        });
    };

    TL_Front.switch_lightbox_state = function ($state_target, $current_state) {
        $state_target.find('.tve_p_lb_overlay').css('opacity', '0.8');
        $state_target.find('.tve_p_lb_content').css('top', $current_state.find('.tve_p_lb_content').css('top')).addClass('tve-leads-triggered');
        return TL_Front.open_lightbox($state_target.find('.tl-lb-target'));
    };

    TL_Front.close_lightbox = function () {
        var $body = ThriveGlobal.$j('body'),
            $html = ThriveGlobal.$j('html'),
            overflow_hidden = 'tve-o-hidden tve-l-open tve-hide-overflow',
            $lightbox = arguments[0] || $body.data('tl-open-lightbox');
        if (!$lightbox || !$lightbox.length) {
            return;
        }

        $lightbox.find('.tve-tl-anim').removeClass('tve-leads-triggered');
        $lightbox.addClass('tve_lb_closing');
        $body.removeClass(overflow_hidden).css('padding-right', '');
        $html.removeClass(overflow_hidden);
        setTimeout(function () {
            $lightbox.removeClass('tve_lb_open tve_lb_opening tve_lb_closing tve_p_lb_background').css('display', 'none').find('tve_p_lb_content').trigger('tve.lightbox-close');
        }, 200);

        $lightbox.find('.thrv_responsive_video iframe').each(function () {
            var $this = ThriveGlobal.$j(this);
            $this.attr('data-src', $this.attr('src'));
            $this.attr('src', '');
        });
        /**
         * close any error messages that might have been displayed on forms inside the lightbox
         */
        ThriveGlobal.$j('#tve-lg-error-container').hide();
    };

    TL_Front.open_lightbox = function ($target, TargetEvent) {

        function getBrowserScrollSize() {
            var $ = ThriveGlobal.$j;
            var css = {
                "border": "none",
                "height": "200px",
                "margin": "0",
                "padding": "0",
                "width": "200px"
            };

            var inner = $("&lt;div&gt;").css($.extend({}, css));
            var outer = $("&lt;div&gt;").css($.extend({
                "left": "-1000px",
                "overflow": "scroll",
                "position": "absolute",
                "top": "-1000px"
            }, css)).append(inner).appendTo("body")
                .scrollLeft(1000)
                .scrollTop(1000);

            var scrollSize = {
                "height": (outer.offset().top - inner.offset().top) || 0,
                "width": (outer.offset().left - inner.offset().left) || 0
            };

            outer.remove();
            return scrollSize;
        }

        /* close any other opened lightboxes */
        TL_Front.close_lightbox(ThriveGlobal.$j('.tve_p_lb_background.tve_lb_open'));

        $target.css('display', '').parents('.tl-style').css('display', '');

        var $body = ThriveGlobal.$j('body'),
            $html = ThriveGlobal.$j('html'),
            overflow_hidden = 'tve-o-hidden tve-l-open tve-hide-overflow',
            scroll_width = getBrowserScrollSize().width,
            oPadding = parseInt($body.css('paddingRight')),
            has_lb_open = ThriveGlobal.$j('.tve_p_lb_background.tve_lb_open').length;

        if (isNaN(oPadding)) {
            oPadding = 0;
        }

        ThriveGlobal.$j('.tve_p_lb_close').off().on("click", function () {
            TL_Front.close_lightbox();
        });

        $body.off('keyup.tve_lb_close').on('keyup.tve_lb_close', function (e) {
            if (e.which == 27) {
                TL_Front.close_lightbox();
            }
        });

        ThriveGlobal.$j('.tve_p_lb_overlay').off('click.tve_lb_close').on('click.tve_lb_close', function () {
            TL_Front.close_lightbox();
        });

        $body.data('tl-open-lightbox', $target);

        $target.addClass('tve_p_lb_background');

        $body.addClass(overflow_hidden);
        $html.addClass(overflow_hidden);

        var wHeight = ThriveGlobal.$j(window).height(),
            page_has_scroll = wHeight &lt; ThriveGlobal.$j(document).height();

        if (page_has_scroll) {
            $body.css('padding-right', (oPadding + scroll_width) + 'px');
        }

        //load the responsive video iframes
        $target.find('.thrv_responsive_video iframe').each(function () {
            var $this = jQuery(this);
            if ($this.attr('data-src')) {
                $this.attr('src', $this.attr('data-src'));
            }
        });

        setTimeout(function () {

            setTimeout(function () {
                $target.addClass('tve_lb_opening');
            }, 0);

            /* reload any iframe that might be in there, this was causing issues with google maps embeds in hidden tabs */
            $target.find('iframe').each(function () {
                var $this = ThriveGlobal.$j(this);
                if ($this.data('tve_ifr_loaded')) {
                    return;
                }
                $this.data('tve_ifr_loaded', 1).attr('src', $this.attr('src'));
            });

            function position_it() {
                var cHeight = $target.find('.tve_p_lb_content').outerHeight(true) + (2 * parseInt($target.css('padding-top'))),
                    $lContent = $target.find('.tve_p_lb_content'),
                    wHeight = ThriveGlobal.$j(window).height(),
                    top = (wHeight - cHeight) / 2;

                $target.find('.tve_p_lb_overlay').css({
                    height: (cHeight + 80) + 'px',
                    'min-height': wHeight + 'px'
                });
                if (has_lb_open) {
                    $lContent.animate({
                        top: (top &lt; 40 ? 40 : top)
                    }, 100);
                } else {
                    $lContent.css('top', (top &lt; 40 ? 40 : top) + 'px');
                }
                if (cHeight + 40 &gt; wHeight) {
                    $target.addClass('tve-scroll');
                }
            }

            position_it();
            ThriveGlobal.$j(window).on('resize', position_it);

        }, 20);

        setTimeout(function () {
            $target.removeClass('tve_lb_opening').addClass('tve_lb_open').find('.tve_p_lb_content').trigger('tve.lightbox-open');
            ThriveGlobal.$j(window).trigger('scroll');
        }, 300);

        // called to stop other events that might interact in the bad way with the lightbox, like a button that redirects the page.
        if (TargetEvent &amp;&amp; TargetEvent.preventDefault) {
            TargetEvent.preventDefault();
            TargetEvent.stopPropagation();
        }
        $target.parents('.tl-states-root').off('switchstate').on('switchstate', function (e, $state) {
            var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1);
            TL_Front.switch_lightbox_state.apply(TL_Front, args);
        });
    };
    TL_Front.open_two_step_lightbox = TL_Front.open_lightbox;


    
    
    
    ThriveGlobal.$j(function () {
        ThriveGlobal.$j(TL_Front).on('showform.thriveleads', function (event, data) {
            var $target = data.$target ? data.$target : ThriveGlobal.$j('.' + data.form_id),
                $anim_target;
            if ($target.attr('data-s-state')) {
                /**
                 * find the already subscribed state and show it
                 */
                $target = $target.closest('.tl-states-root').find('[data-state="' + $target.attr('data-s-state') + '"] .tl-lb-target');
            }
            $anim_target = $target.hasClass('tve-tl-anim') ? $target : $target.find('.tve-tl-anim');
            $target.css('display', '');
            setTimeout(function () {
                $anim_target.addClass('tve-leads-triggered');
                TCB_Front.postGridLayout();
            }, 0);

            if (typeof TL_Front['open_' + data.form_type] === 'function') {
                TL_Front['open_' + data.form_type]($target, data.TargetEvent);
            } else {
                $target.show();
            }
            setTimeout(function () {
                $target.find('.thrv_responsive_video iframe').each(function () {
                    var $this = ThriveGlobal.$j(this);
                    if ($this.attr('data-src')) {
                        $this.attr('src', $this.attr('data-src'));
                    }
                });
            }, 200);
        });
        if (!TL_Const.ajax_load) {
            setTimeout(TL_Front.do_impression, 2000);
        }
    });
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function ($) {
        $(function () {
            var event_data = {"form_id":"tve-leads-track-lightbox-8","form_type":"lightbox"},
                _ms = parseInt(7000),
                event_triggered = false;
            event_data.source = 'time';
            setTimeout(function () {
                if (!event_triggered) {
                    ThriveGlobal.$j(TL_Front).trigger('showform.thriveleads', event_data);
                    event_triggered = true;
                }
            }, _ms);
                    });
    })(ThriveGlobal.$j);
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function ($) {
        $(function () {
            var event_data = {"form_id":"tve-leads-track-widget-9","form_type":"widget"};
            event_data.source = 'page_load';
            setTimeout(function () {
                ThriveGlobal.$j(TL_Front).trigger('showform.thriveleads', event_data);
            }, 200);
        });
    })(ThriveGlobal.$j);
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var TVE_Event_Manager_Registered_Callbacks = TVE_Event_Manager_Registered_Callbacks || {};TVE_Event_Manager_Registered_Callbacks.tl_state_lb_close = function(){ThriveGlobal.$j(".tve_p_lb_close").trigger("click");return false;};
  </script>
  <script async="" defer="" src="http://stats.wp.com/e-201529.js" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   _stq = window._stq || [];
	_stq.push([ 'view', {v:'ext',j:'1:3.5.3',blog:'21634802',post:'15362',tz:'-4',srv:'vactruth.com'} ]);
	_stq.push([ 'clickTrackerInit', '21634802', '15362' ]);
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
